exp: Completing an in-house Workflow Editor and Admin UI for Business Process Management team using React.js, Typescript, and Node.js.
Collaborating with .NET engineers to integrate backend services with the frontend application.
Implementing unit tests and end-to-end tests to ensure code quality and reliability.
Overlook coursework related to CMSC335 Intro to Web Development
Conduct office hours and grade and proctor Exams
Manage a network of events and organize the hackathon's environment for 1000+ hackers
Co-lead a team of 8 to ensure event planning and merchandise for the hackathon
Document and photograph social campaigns and events.
Use Adobe Lightroom to enhance photos and professional transform images.
Coordinate details with outside companies and organizations to create mini events for 800+ expected hackers
Facilitate bonding between Technica organizers and promote team curated events to hackers
Assist sponsorship ordeals and communication with large companies using previous personal experience and connections
Organize and direct the organization's largest event of the spring semester with an attendance of ~1400 students
Connect with and secured $12,000 in sponsorships with large APIDA owned businesses and embassies
